summary: it replaces the typical skyrim wallpaper with several khajiit type
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]Do you get bored with the Skyrim logo every time you enter the game? Are you a fan of the khajiits ?, you came to the right place, this mod replaces the skyrim logo with a beautiful khajiit wallpaper!.

[/size]==============================================================================================================================================
[/center][center]
[color=#ff0000][size=3]>>>I'm not sure if this mod has support for all screen resolutions, say it in the comments<<<

[/size][/color][size=4] ﻿[img]https://i.imgur.com/fVuQP47.png[/img]﻿

[color=#d8d8d8]I recommend using NMM or MO for an easier installation[/color][/size][/center][size=4][color=#d8d8d8]
[center]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[/color][/size][center][size=4][img]https://i.imgur.com/peyXbjI.png[/img]﻿

[color=#616161][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3708/]MAIN MENU WALLPAPER REPLACER HD 1080[/url]﻿ [/color][color=#efefef]By [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1535027]HellStorm102[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/35431/]Eiries[/url]﻿﻿ (some of the wallpapers are made by the)
[/color][/size][size=4][color=#efefef][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6565535]Shinglescat[/url]﻿ (some of the wallpapers are made by the)
and the authors of the rest of the wallpapers
[/color][/size]

[color=#000000]Sorry for my bad English but it is not my main language and I used the google translator[/color][/center]
author: Draco
